mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT RESCH_PAT_ID patientId, 'xxxx' sampleId, '9999' age, 'xxxx' cancerStudies, 'xxxxx' cancerType, 'xxxx' cancerTypeDetails FROM CLSPNEXRT

SELECT DISTINCT EXAM_CD id, IFNULL(EXAM_ENG_NM, EXAM_CD) name FROM CLSPNEXRT
WHERE LENGTH(EXAM_CD) < 6

SELECT 'Lab_test' subject, EXAM_SLIP_CD pid , EXAM_CD id, EXAM_ENG_NM name, RCEP_DT time, SUM(EXAM_RSLT_VAL) exam, SUM(MARK_RSLT_VAL) mark, IFNULL(SUM(CRTE_MSR_VAL),0) crte
FROM CLSPNEXRT WHERE RESCH_PAT_ID = '6905950076' AND EXAM_CD = 'DA0036' GROUP BY EXAM_SLIP_CD, EXAM_CD, EXAM_ENG_NM, RCEP_DT ORDER BY 5 LIMIT 300
